thread.title: Gossip & Rumours: Xhaka faces no further action over alleged racist comments
thread.title_full: Gossip & Rumours: Xhaka faces no further action over alleged racist comments

title: Gossip & Rumours: Xhaka faces no further action over alleged racist comments
text:
By Game Yetu Monday, February 13th 2017 at 18:23 [PHOTO: COURTESY] 
Granit Xhaka will face no further action over his alleged racist comments to a Heathrow airport worker, as per the Sun. 
The star was hauled in for showdown talks with club boss Arsene Wenger after being interviewed under caution in a police station. 
He was accused of racially abusing a member of British Airwaysâ€™ check-in staff just a day after his red card in a 2-1 home win over Burnley.
